text: {{Infobox settlement | name = | native_name = Bezirk Bregenz | native_name_lang = de | settlement_type = District | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Karte-vorarlberg-B.png | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Austria | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Vorarlberg | subdivision_type2 = Number of municipalities | subdivision_name2 = 40 | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = | seat = | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 863.37 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 130,425 | population_as_of = 2012 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01:00 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +02:00 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = Telephone prefix | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = NUTS code | blank_info_sec1 = }} The Bregenz District is a district in Vorarlberg, Austria. It has an area of 863.37 km². As of 2012, 130,425 people lived there. The administrative center of the district is Bregenz. == Geography == It is in the Bregenz Forest region, the Leiblach valley, and the Austrian part of Lake Constance. == Places == The district has 40 municipalities, one of them is a town, and four are market towns. === Towns === #Bregenz === Market towns === #Bezau #Hard #Lauterach #Wolfurt === Municipalities === #Alberschwende #Andelsbuch #Au #Bildstein #Bizau #Buch #Damüls #Doren #Egg #Eichenberg #Fußach #Gaißau #Hittisau #Höchst #Hohenweiler #Hörbranz #Kennelbach #Krumbach #Langen #Langenegg #Lingenau #Lochau #Mellau #Mittelberg #Möggers #Reuthe #Riefensberg #Schnepfau #Schoppernau #Schröcken #Schwarzach #Schwarzenberg #Sibratsgfäll #Sulzberg #Warth == References == Category:Districts of Vorarlberg
title: Bregenz (district)
